Which THREE balls are needed to be moved to turn the image upside down? Choose any three options
Choose the shape that you think does not go with the other three and type your answer in the given box.
Mr. and Mrs. Winchester have six sons and each son has one sister. How many members are in Winchester family?
(10) Mr. and Mrs. Wenchester = 2, Six sons = 6, Each son has one sister = 1; 2+6+1=9
